Backing up your data to Google Drive allows you to restore all your trainings in case you lose or change devices.

[{\"title\":\"Feather\",\"name\":\"zsoltherpai\",\"description\":\"Feather is an ultra-lightweight dependency injection (JSR-330) library for Java and Android.\",\"url\": \"https://github.com/zsoltherpai/feather\"},{\"title\":\"Butter Knife\",\"name\":\"JakeWharton\",\"description\":\"Field and method binding for Android views which uses annotation processing to generate boilerplate code for you.\",\"url\": \"https://github.com/JakeWharton/butterknife\"},{\"title\":\"EventBus\",\"name\":\"greenrobot\",\"description\":\"EventBus is a publish/subscribe event bus optimized for Android.\",\"url\": \"https://github.com/greenrobot/EventBus\"},{\"title\":\"Joda-Time\",\"name\":\"JodaOrg\",\"description\":\"Joda-Time provides a quality replacement for the Java date and time classes. The design allows for multiple calendar systems, while still providing a simple API.\",\"url\": \"https://github.com/JodaOrg/joda-time\"},{\"title\":\"Parceler\",\"name\":\"johncarl81\",\"description\":\"Parceler is a code generation library that generates the Android Parcelable boilerplate source code.\",\"url\": \"https://github.com/johncarl81/parceler\"},{\"title\":\"Material Dialogs\",\"name\":\"afollestad\",\"description\":\"Material Dialogs library allows you to use a consistently Material themed dialog on all versions of Android, along with specific customizations that make it easier to brand the dialog.\",\"url\": \"https://github.com/afollestad/material-dialogs\"},{\"title\":\"Number Picker\",\"name\":\"ShawnLin013\",\"description\":\"The android library that provides a simple and customizable NumberPicker. It\'s based on android.widget.NumberPicker.\",\"url\": \"https://github.com/ShawnLin013/NumberPicker\"},{\"title\":\"RoundCornerProgressBar\",\"name\":\"akexorcist\",\"description\":\"Colorful progress bar with round corner on progress which you can customized a color and corner radius.\",\"url\": \"https://github.com/akexorcist/Android-RoundCornerProgressBar\"},{\"title\":\"CircularView\",\"name\":\"JakeWharton\",\"description\":\"A \'Google Fit\'-like implementation of a circular view.\",\"url\": \"https://github.com/rjsvieira/circularView\"},{\"title\":\"freesound\",\"name\":\"\",\"description\":\"Freesound is a collaborative database of Creative Commons Licensed sounds. Browse, download and share sounds.\",\"url\": \"https://freesound.org/\"}]
